sourcesContent:
import React,{Fragment} from 'react'
import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container';
import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar';
import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav';
import { Link, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import './coreCss/Menu.css'
import { signout,isAuthenticated } from '../auth/helper';


const Menu =() => {
  return (
    <Navbar collapseOnSelect expand="lg" bg="dark" variant="dark" className="p-3">
      <Container>
        <Navbar.Brand href="/"  >FURNITURE</Navbar.Brand>
        <Navbar.Toggle aria-controls="responsive-navbar-nav" />
        <Navbar.Collapse id="responsive-navbar-nav">
          <Nav className="me-auto">
            <Nav.Link >
              <Link  className="text-decoration-none text-white bg-dark " to="/">
                Home
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>
            <Nav.Link>
              <Link className="text-decoration-none  text-white bg-dark shadow-sm py-2 px-4 mb-1 bg-body rounded  " to="/cart">
                Cart
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>
            {isAuthenticated() && isAuthenticated().user.role ===0 && (<Nav.Link>
              <Link className="text-decoration-none text-white bg-dark shadow-sm py-2 px-4 mb-1 bg-body rounded  " to="/user/dashboard">
                Dashboard
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>)}
            
            {isAuthenticated() && isAuthenticated().user.role ===1 && (<Nav.Link>
              <Link className="text-decoration-none text-white bg-dark shadow-sm py-2 px-4 mb-1 bg-body rounded  " to="/admin/dashboard">
                Admin Dashboard
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>)}
            {!isAuthenticated() && (<Fragment>
            <Nav.Link>

              <Link className="text-decoration-none text-white bg-dark shadow-sm py-2 px-4 mb-1 bg-body rounded  " to="/signin">
                SignIn
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>
            <Nav.Link>

              <Link className="text-decoration-none text-white bg-dark shadow-sm py-2 px-4 mb-1 bg-body rounded" to="/signup">
                SignUp
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>
            </Fragment>)}
            {isAuthenticated() && (<Nav.Link>
              {' '}
              <Link className="text-decoration-none text-white bg-dark shadow-sm py-2 px-4 mb-1 bg-body rounded" onClick={()=>{
                signout(()=>{
                  Navigate('/')
                })
              }} to="/signout">
              SignOut 
              </Link>
            </Nav.Link>)}
            
          </Nav>
        </Navbar.Collapse>
      </Container>
    </Navbar>

      
  )
}

// export default withRouter(Menu)
export default Menu
